name: B. Gellyfish and Baby s Breath
statement:
Flower gives Gellyfish two permutations^{
text{ }} of [0, 1,
ldots, n-1]: p_0, p_1,
ldots, p_{n-1} and q_0, q_1,
ldots, q_{n-1}.Now Gellyfish wants to calculate an array r_0,r_1,
ldots,r_{n-1} through the following method: For all i (0
leq i
leq n-1), r_i =
max
limits_{j=0}^{i}
left(2^{p_j} + 2^{q_{i-j}}
right) But since Gellyfish is very lazy, you have to help her figure out
the elements of r.Since the elements of r are very large, you are only
required to output the elements of r modulo 998
,244
,353.^{
text{ }}An array b is a permutation of an array a if b consists of the
elements of a in arbitrary order. For example, [4,2,3,4] is a
permutation of [3,2,4,4] while [1,2,2] is not a permutation of [1,2,3].
